6193.quoteText:
privacytoolsIO respects your Do Not Track setting in your browser.
Users with Do Not Track enabled will not be tracked by any of our platforms.
6193.title: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers

tosdr.case: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers

6208.quoteText: drawback that certain features of privacytoolsIO's websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies
6208.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states that "privacytoolsIO visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using privacytoolsIO's websites, with the drawback that certain features of privacytoolsIO's websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies."

6209.quoteText:
Although most changes are likely to be minor, privacytoolsIO may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and at privacytoolsIO's sole discretion.
privacytoolsIO encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy.
6209.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

6211.quoteText: You may irreversibly delete your account at any time.
6211.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

6212.quoteText: We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety.
6212.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service can share your personal information to third parties
tosdr.tldr: Privacytools.io's Mastondon service can "release your information when [they] believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce [their] site policies, or protect [theirs] or others rights, property, or safety."

6213.quoteText: You may enable two-factor authentication to further secure access to your account.
6213.title: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

tosdr.case: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

6214.quoteText:
How do we protect your information?

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information. Among other things, your browser session, as well as the traffic between your applications and the API, are secured with SSL, and your password is hashed using a strong one-way algorithm.
6214.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices
